title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-7.2 - Exempt facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-7.2 - Exempt facilities

State Regulations

The following facilities are exempt from this

Subpart: (a) Motor vehicle repair
shops registered with the New York State Department of Motor Vehicles that
store no more than 50 end-of-life vehicles on-site at any one time. (b) Scrap metal processors that store no more
than 1,000 cubic yards of metal on-site at any one time. (c) Vehicle dismantling facilities that
receive no more than 25 end-of-life vehicles per year and store no more than 50
end-of-life vehicles on-site at any one time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-7.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
